text: Va cun ʙa'ze musalmonon ʙa jahudijon guftand; ki ʙa on ci Alloh nozil kardaast, imon ʙijovared, megujand: «Mo ʙa on ci ʙar xudamon nozil sudaast, imon meovarem». Va ʙa ƣajri on (Tavrot) harcand ʙo haqiqat hamroh ʙosad va kitoʙasonro ham tasdiq kunad, imon nameovarand. Agar onho ʙa Tavrot haqqoni imon meovardand, haroina Qur'onro tasdiq menamudand. Ej Muhammad, ʙarojason ʙigu: «Agar sumo imon ovarda ʙuded, az ci saʙaʙ pajomʙaroni Allohro pes az in mekusted?»
